alert.note: Alert for De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 12:15PM CDT until May 11 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, Bossier, Caddo and De Soto. * WHEN...Until 315 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1215 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Benton, Stonewall, Fosters, Eastwood, Barksdale Air Force Base, Forbing, Ferguson, Cross Lake, Robson, Red Chute, Bodcau, Sligo, Keithville, Taylortown and Linton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
